Tamrit Colony, \nAngul, \nOdisha, \nPin-759122 Saradhapur, \nAngul, \nOdisha,\nPin-759040
Creative Techno College\n\"ଅନୁଗୋଳ ଜିଲ୍ଲାର ରାଜ୍ୟ ସରକାରଙ୍କର ପ୍ରଥମ ସ୍ଥାୟୀ ସ୍ଵୀକୃତି ପ୍ରାପ୍ତ ପ୍ରଫେସନାଲ ଡିଗ୍ରୀ କଲେଜ - Affiliated to Utkal University, Odisha\"
Creative techno college, angul is located at baluakata, sharadhapur, angul. It is recognised by govt. of Odisha, dept. of higher education and affilated to Utkal university. It is a pioneer college in central Odisha providing it and management education like BCA, BBA and B.sc. computer science under Utkal univerisity, vani vihar, Bhubaneswar.
The college has a group of experienced faculties and supporting staffs. It has well equipped infrastructure and air conditioned computer labs. Besides course curriculum the college has laid emphasis to develop students “professional skill” through soft skill training like spoken English, group discussion, debate, power point presentation, and quiz and mock interviews. Soft skill training has been providing to coup with the need of the hour and to make them corporate ready. The college has a special placement cell and has proven record in providing placement assistance to successful students.
Mr. Gyanendra Ku. Sahoo\n\t\t\tDirector of CTC Mr. Bhabani Shankar Sahoo\n\t\t\tProject Manager \" Building Career\n Changing Lives !!! \"
